result.reason: The feature requests adding Ctrl+Alt+End/Del shortcuts for nested RDP sessions, which is feasible by extending the SendSpecialKeys functionality to RDP via the IMsRdpClientNonScriptable interface.
result.approach: 1. Promote SpecialKeys enum to ProtocolBase. 2. Implement SendSpecialKeys in RdpProtocol using IMsRdpClientNonScriptable.SendKeys. 3. Update ConnectionWindow to include Ctrl+Alt+End menu option and enable it for RDP.
